summary: This is an email containing SDNY press clippings from January 28, 2021, summarizing news articles about Ghislaine Maxwell's case. The articles report on court documents alleging Maxwell forced underage girls into sexual performances for Jeffrey Epstein and her denial of knowing the full scope of his activities.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Accused of directing underage girls to perform sexually for Jeffrey Epstein; denies knowing the full scope of his sexual activities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Late financier for whom Maxwell allegedly forced underage girls to perform sexually.

connections.description: Maxwell is accused of directing underage girls to perform sexually for Epstein, indicating an alleged conspiratorial relationship in sexual abuse.
Maxwell denies knowing the full scope of Epstein's sexual activities, but their association is central to the allegations.

events.title: Press coverage of Maxwell court documents
events.description: News articles report on court documents revealing allegations that Ghislaine Maxwell forced underage girls into sexual performances for Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Court documents allege Ghislaine Maxwell directed underage girls to 'kiss, dance and touch one another in a sexual way' for Jeffrey Epstein.
Ghislaine Maxwell denies knowing the full scope of Jeffrey Epstein's sexual activities.
The information comes from press clippings compiled by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
